name: Dinos Vs Volcanoes
description:
Ludum Dare entry for the jam!

The shield volcanoes are great against the brontosaurs.

The composite volcanoes are great against the triceratops.

Caldera is great against the spinosaurus.

Don't let the dinos move all the way left!

KNOWN ISSUES:

Some people have had some missing DLL issues, trying to work it out...

Hambone
